item.description:
Lets ring in Friday with some fun and dancing,,please make sure you bring your dancing shoes as we rock the night away!! PARTY !! PARTY !!! PARTY!!

We will start out on the deck that has 2 huge bars, tons of patio tables and an Acoustical Band "Paul Costley" around 9pm we can head inside as we get prepared for the band 'Hypercane" I have heard great things about there music.

If any one wants dinner we can eat on the deck, just please come early as they do not take reservations. Huge parking lot and very large lounge and dance floor.

This event is cross posted with others.

 

P.S. Its also one of our members BDAY "Natalie" so it will be even more of a reason for you to come out and help us make it a super night. Look forward to all who can attend.

 

Band: Hypercane

Time: 9-9:30 to 1am
item.how_to_find_us: We will start off on the outside deck, then had in later for the band Eva Cell 978 857-6626
item.name: It's A Celebration at Derryfield with "Hypercane Live Band"
